text: The 1925 Volta a Catalunya was the seventh edition of the Volta a Catalunya cycle race and was held from 21 May to 24 May 1925. The race started and finished in Barcelona. The race was won by . == Route and stages == {| class="wikitable" |+List of stages |- ! scope="col" | Stage ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Course ! scope="col" | Distance ! scope="col" | Winner |- ! scope="row" | 1 | style="text-align:right" | 21 May | Barcelona to Figueres | style="text-align:center;"| | |- ! scope="row" | 2 (A) | style="text- align:right" | 22 May | Figueres to Vic | style="text-align:center;"| | |- ! scope="row" | 2 (B) | style="text-align:right" | 22 May | Vic to Igualada | style="text-align:center;"| | |- ! scope="row" | 3 | style="text-align:right" | 23 May | Igualada to Reus | style="text-align:center;"| | |- ! scope="row" | 4 | style="text-align:right" | 24 May | Reus to Barcelona | style="text- align:center;"| | |- ! scope="row" | | colspan="2" style="text-align:center" | Total | colspan="5" style="text-align:center" | |} ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 5' 10" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 10' 09" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 13' 15" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 17' 54" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 24' 01" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 24' 45" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 35' 44" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 39' 27" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 39' 27" |} |} ==References== 1925 Volta Category:1925 in Spanish road cycling Category:May 1925 sports events
